response.job_title: Software Engineer en Lean Solutions Group
response.summary: Talented agile software developer skilled at technical leadership, communication and presentations. Experienced in full project life cycle from design and implementation to continuous deployment producing high quality web-based solutions, optimized structures and processes to accomplish customer targets. Fluent in diverse programming languages, including Java and Groovy.
response.skills: Desarrollo de software, Grails, Java, Scrum, Software Development, Bases de datos, Hibernate, HTML, jQuery, JavaScript, MySQL, PostgreSQL, JSON, Oracle SQL Developer, WebSphere Application Server, Spring Framework, Git, SQL, Spring MVC, JPA

profile_positions.description:
* Led Backend software development initiative as Subject Matter Expert
* Wrote high quality, solid code on Java and Groovy platform using diverse frameworks and libraries such as: Spring Boot, Spring Security, Kafka, Eventuate, Spock, JUnit, JPA, Hibernate, S3client, Jackson, AWS secrets, Spring Cloud, AVRO, Swagger, Elastic Search, Gradle, and Maven, among others.
* Lead the technical team on the adoption of good coding practices.
* Support code quality assurance by doing pair code reviews and incorporating the use of continuous code inspection tools like Sonar, achieving high code quality and high test code coverage. 
* Contribute in the design and construction of micro-services architecture web solutions, resulting in high performing and resilient products.
* Work closely with software development and testing team members to design and develop robust web solutions to meet client requirements for functionality, scalability, and performance. 
* Work with project managers, developers, quality assurance, and customers to resolve technical issues, guarantee to achieve the development commitment, analyze risk, and propose strategies to mitigate them. 
* Interface with a cross-functional team of business analysts, developers, and
technical support professionals to determine a comprehensive list of requirement specifications for new applications. Work using agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban) and best practices to software development division to enhance product definition and application customization, increasing the code quality and the deployment recurrence. 
* Collaborate on all stages of the systems development lifecycle, from requirements gathering to production releases. Discussed project progress with customers, collected feedback on different stages, and directly addressed concerns. Estimated work hours and tracked progress using Agile/SCRUM methodology.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
* Led Backend software development initiative as Subject Matter Expert. 
* Reviewed and contributed to the technical solutions design resulting in clean, solid design that responds properly to the client functional and non-functional requirements. 
* Collaborated with cross-functional development team members to analyze potential system solutions based on evolving client requirements. 
* Rapidly prototyped new data processing capabilities to confirm integration feasibility into existing systems. 
* Designed, implemented and maintained databases using Oracle SQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL and IBM DB2. 
* Consulted with network engineering staff to evaluate hardware and software requirements for new system development. Automated and implemented backup and recovery procedures for Disaster Recovery systems.
profile_positions.title: Software Designer

profile_positions.description:
* Worked effectively with cross-functional design teams to create software solutions that elevated client side experience and significantly improved overall functionality and performance. 
* Designed and implemented high quality code solutions that satisfied the client requirements in an agile environment. 
* Contributed with the knowledge sharing among the team by leading Java training sessions. Increased the team code quality by introducing and reinforcing good code practices.
* Supported test automation tasks using tools like Selenium, RFT and UFT among others.
profile_positions.title: Java Ssr Developer

profile_positions.description:
* Conducted research and investigations into test automation area, resulting in the design and implementation of a new set of tools for this purpose. 
* Provided observations, took measurements and performed tests at various stages according to quality control plan. 
* Design and implementation of new test automation tools as a SAAS web solution, using the Grails Framework
profile_positions.title: Research and Development Analyst

company.name: Lean Solutions Group
company.description:
Lean Solutions Group, established in 2012 and based in Coral Springs, Florida, is a nearshore and offshore services provider with a highly scalable and flexible workforce of 10,000 employees with operations at seven satellite offices in Colombia, Guatemala, Mexico, and the Philippines. Partnering with more than 500 U.S.-based companies, Lean Solutions Group’s expanded service offerings include staffing, technology, marketing, sales, and business process outsourcing services, all in one place. By leveraging the best talent, culture, and price that Lean Solutions provide, businesses can lower operational costs and drive business growth.

- Up to 50% cost savings on direct costs. 
- Minimal Turnover
- No lengthy and costly recruitment process
- Trained Bilingual Professionals who can adapt to any industry. 
- All perks and benefits in one low monthly fee per employee. 
- Onsite Management Team overseeing your employees at all times. 
- Unlimited growth potential 
- Ability to scale up or down with minimal impact on your infrastructure 
- Maintain your culture and productivity 
- Guidance from a credible nearshore partner dedicated to your organization’s success. 
- Nearshore/Offshore.
